Description: 

1715, Caribbean. Pirates have become true masters of the sea and land, by organizing their own republic wickedness, greed and cruelty. 

Among these robbers noticeable young Captain Edward Kenuey. His journey has allowed him to win the respect of such legends as Blackbeard, but also drew in the ancient war between the Assassins and the Templars, in a war that could destroy all that we have created the pirates. 

Welcome to the Golden Age of Piracy! 

GAME FEATURES: 

Gameplay Assassin's Creed 4, according to Ubisoft, based on the proven pillars of the series. We have an open world with more than 50 locations. Edward will be able to use weapons of assassins in combination with the characteristic weapon era. Move between locations can be a hero on their own ship, and engage in naval battles. 

In Assassin's Creed 4 made a huge emphasis on naval battles, more than 40% of the plot will take place in the depths of the sea. Players have their own boat, which you can improve, modify and install it on various weapons. There will be an opportunity to recruit a team, rob ships to go on board the ship, and even hunt whales.
